chart.name: chart-count-tasks-by-project
chart.title: Count of tasks in the project
chart.dataset: SELECT p.name AS project_name, s.name AS status, COUNT(pt.id) AS total_tasks FROM project_project p JOIN project_project_task pt ON pt.project = p.id JOIN project_task_status s ON pt.status = s.id GROUP BY p.name, s.name ORDER BY project_name, total_tasks DESC;

chart.name: chart-count-hours-spent-project
chart.title: Count of hours spent on the project
chart.dataset: SELECT p.name AS project_name, s.name AS status, SUM(pt.spent_time) AS total_hours FROM project_project p JOIN project_project_task pt ON pt.project = p.id JOIN project_task_status s ON pt.status = s.id GROUP BY p.name, s.name ORDER BY project_name, total_hours DESC;

chart.name: chart-count-people-working-project
chart.title: Count of people working on the project
chart.dataset: SELECT p.name AS project_name, COUNT(ppm.members_user_set) AS total_person FROM project_project p JOIN project_project_members_user_set ppm ON p.id = ppm.project_set GROUP BY p.name ORDER BY total_person DESC;
